createAndQueryDB.description: Create DB from data and run query

props.name: tables
props.description: List of tables to create in the database

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the table to create

props.name: data
props.description: Table data in the form of a JSON array of objects. Object keys would be taken as column names.

props.name: schema
props.description:
Provide the schema as a JSON object. Note that only the specified columns would be loaded.
Leave empty to autodetect schema, although it is recommended to specify the schema for consistency and avoid unexpected behaviour.

More information on data types and accepted values:
- https://duckdb.org/2023/03/03/json
- https://duckdb.org/docs/stable/sql/data_types/overview

props.name: query
props.description: Please use $1, $2, etc. for parameterized queries to avoid SQL injection.

props.name: args
props.description: Arguments to be used in the query
